articles.title: Luis Jalandoni dies at 90
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines — Luis 'Ka Louie' Jalandoni, exiled senior adviser to the National Democratic Front of the Philippines (NDFP) and one of the most recognizable figures in the country's communist movement, died on Saturday, June 7, in Utrecht, the Netherlands. He was 90.
